programs.title: Mindfulness of Breath
programs.description: Take your first steps into meditation. Learn how to pause, breathe, and become aware of the present moment.

programs.description: Reconnect with your body by moving your attention through physical sensations and releasing tension.

programs.description: Build a regular practice with guided sessions designed to improve focus, posture, and inner stability.

programs.title: Relaxing Sounds and Bells
programs.description: Unwind and let go with calming soundscapes that help you relax, rest, and reset.
